rewrite1:

For the fourth paragraph, update the line spacing to 1.5 lines for a cleaner look. Furthermore, increase the space before the paragraph to the equivalent of one line for better visual separation. Change the font to SimHei for a sleek appearance, and apply a blue hue to the text for emphasis."
